title: Straight Line Nylon Slotted Spoon
description: Straight Line's Nylon Slotted Serving Spoon has the highly polished surface that is hard wearing, easy to clean and hygienic., Advanced manufacturing methods plus traditional craftsmanship guarantee flawless product quality. Nylon head is safe to use with non-stick cookware. Measures 9-1/4 in.Highly polished handleSafe for use with non-stick cookwareEasy to clean designA mus have for any kitchen
